title: Slate Money: Food: Fast Food
description:
In this Slate Money mini-series, Felix Salmon talks to guests about the economics of food.

Marcia Chatelain, author of Franchise: The Golden Arches in Black America, joins to discuss the complex relationship between fast food franchises and African American communities.  

Email: slatemoney@slate.com

Podcast production by Jessamine Molli. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
